name: GRIDLOCK (Resurge) (Resurge)
description:
(PRESS ⏎ TO SKIP THE LEVEL IF YOU'RE STUCK!)

This is the updated version of Gridlock. To play the Game Jam version, click here

Gridlock is a short puzzle game where you manipulate the level and guide the hero to success.

Instructions:

Gogo automatically moves right - you must manipulate the level to guide him to the chest at the bottom right hand corner of the level. Read the in-game instructions for further details.

Thanks for playing our game and leave your feedback in the comments!

Credits:

Programming by Luke Gahng-Guzen

Art and UI by Jonathan Martin

Music by Mark Sparling (with permission) - (link)
